# TreeViewColumnDropFunc delegate

```csharp
public delegate bool TreeViewColumnDropFunc(IntPtr tree_view, IntPtr column, IntPtr prev_column, 
    IntPtr next_column, IntPtr data);
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| tree_view | Transfer ownership: none |
| column | Transfer ownership: none |
| prev_column | Transfer ownership: none |
| next_column | Transfer ownership: none |
| data | Transfer ownership: none; Nullable: true |

## Return Value

Transfer ownership: none
